data: Many men swore that The Orphan was bad, and many swore profanely and with wonderful command of epithets because he was bad, but for obvious reasons that was as far as the majority went to show their displeasure.
Mulford, Clarence Edward, 1883-1956; True, Allen Tupper, 1881-1955 [Illustrator]
